department: Department of Biochemical Engineering and Biotechnology
name: BBL331 Bioprocess Engineering
description: Microbial growth, substrate utilisation, and product formation kinetics; simple structured models; batch, fed-batch, repeated fed-batch, CSTR, CSTR with recycle, multistage CSTRs, and PFR; aeration and agitation; rheology of fermentation fluids; mixing and scale-up; air sterilization; media sterilization; design of fermentation media; aseptic transfer.
